pageContext.description:
This panel depicts a bust-length portrait of Johann (1468-1532), the Steadfast, Elector of Saxony, wearing a fur cloak and black cap, against a neutral background. 
[cda 2020]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 45.1 x 36.2 cm
